data.body: Rishi Hiranyastupa Angiras's Mantra on Agni recited in Jagati Chhand meter.
प्रथमं मण्डलमं, अनु ७, ३१ सूक्तम् ऋषि: हरिण्यस्तुप आन्गिरासः छन्द: जगती अग्निः देव
त्वमग्ने प्रयतदक्षिणं नरं वर्मेव स्यूतं परि पासि विश्वतः । स्वादुक्षद्मा यो वसतौ स्योनकृज्जीवयाजं यजते सोपमा दिवः ॥
tva magne prayat-a-daksinam naram varm-a-eva syutam pari pasi visvatah; svadu-a-ksadma yah vasatau (staying) syon-a-krit jiv-a-yajam yajate sah up-a-ma divah.

tva magne (you agni) prayat-a-daksinam (donor, one who has made the gifts) naram (man) varm-a-eva (of the aquatic) syutam (pierced, sewn) pari (around) pasi (spear) visvatah (in all directions); svadu-a-ksadma (providing sweets) yah (who, that) vasatau (staying) syon-a-krit jiv-a-yajam (syonkrit - providing comfort jivayaj - through sacrifice) yajate (of sacrifice) sah up-a-ma (dealing with the same way) divah (heavens)
